body.p: Mr Gray sends his Compliments to Mr Brocket. shall be extremely obliged to him, if he would make inquiry (when he has occasion to go into: Trin: Library) after the following old English Books

list.item: W: Webbe's Discourse of Eng. Poetrie. 1585. 4to
Sam: Daniel's Musa or Defence of Rhyme 16[11.] [8]vo
Gawen Douglas' Palace of Honour 1553 Lond: [15]79 Ed[in:]

body.p: If they should not be in the Library, Mr Gray believes that Professor Torriano could favour him with a sight of some of them for a few days. he will take all imaginable care of them.
